blog's List

Lab1

In this lab write-up, I have documented my experience using Static Site Generation (SSG) and the benefits it offers in web development. SSG provides a way to pre-render web pages as static HTML files, making websites faster, more secure, and easier to host. To dive deeper into SSG, I explored various template engines, analyzed their pros and cons, and chose one to use for my assignment based on its ease of use. Additionally, I researched other popular SSG tools beyond Eleventy (11ty) to understand the broader landscape. For the assignment, I configured 11ty based on its documentation, applying specific settings to streamline my siteâ€™s structure and efficiency. Lastly, I researched about front matter to understand how it enhances content management in SSG by providing metadata that influences how pages are rendered and displayed. Through this ab research I gained a more thorough understanding of SSG and the practical aspects of implementing it in web projects.
